description: Get ready for TommyD at his finest.  It's scenes like this that have given Tommy his reputation for epic solo sessions like no one else can 'pull off.' This also includes a rare, behind-the-scenes look at an actual TommyD photo shoot.  See what it's like before Tommy gets some alone time with just the camera and his fans.  And when the photographers do leave, Tommy cranks up the intensity level.  He's putting on plenty of lube and getting a little rough this time with some firm grabbing and hard ball tugging.  He's letting his animal side take over and no rules apply!   Enjoy!
title: Tommy Gets Hard With Himself
